parameters: This chain serves as a hand rail for the bridge.
The chain is a bit rusty from the stream's occasional splashing.
The chain seems like it would be a good rope substitute.
Too bad it's welded into the support poles.
You currently have no pieces of \c[5]rope material\c[0].
You currently have \c[5]1\c[0] piece of \c[5]rope material\c[0].
You currently have \c[5]\v[4]\c[0] pieces of \c[5]rope material\c[0].
Nothing is protecting this side of the stream.
Now that there's no chain here, it's more likely for someone to fall into the stream.
The other side never had a chain though, so safety was never this bridge's strong suit.
What? Are you trying to take the poles? The water?
You can't, so don't even try.
